## Dataframe for linking subject IDs
```{r}
# Filter out people who didn't finish
subids <-
  subids %>% 
  filter(complete == "Y") %>% 
  select(-complete)
```

```{r}
# Link subids to asa24
asa_24 <-
  subids %>% 
  left_join(
    asa_24 %>% mutate(asa24_id = UserName),
    by = "asa24_id"
  )

# Link ssdm2 survey to asa24
asa_24 <-
  asa_24 %>% 
  left_join(
    ssdm2_survey_data_nadm %>% 
      mutate(ssdm2_subid = as.character(subid)),
    by = "ssdm2_subid"
  )


# Link subids to asa24 totals
asa_24_total <-
  subids %>% 
  left_join(
    asa_24_total %>% mutate(asa24_id = UserName),
    by = "asa24_id"
  )

# Link ssdm2 survey to asa24 totals
asa_24_total <-
  asa_24_total %>% 
  left_join(
    ssdm2_survey_data_nadm %>% 
      mutate(ssdm2_subid = as.character(subid)),
    by = "ssdm2_subid"
  )
```


```{r}
subids$ssdm2_subid

ssdm2_survey_data_nadm <-

```


```{r}
redcap_ema <-
  redcap %>%
  mutate(
    day = str_extract(redcap_event_name, "day_\\d"),
    survey = str_extract(redcap_event_name, "survey_\\d")
  ) %>% 
  select(subid = user_name, day, survey, ema_survey_timestamp:ema_survey_complete) %>% 
  filter(!is.na(day))

redcap_ema <-
  redcap_ema %>% 
  filter(subid %in% c(subids$redcap_record_id)) %>% 
  left_join(subids %>% mutate(subid = redcap_record_id), by = "subid")
```


```{r}
redcap_ema %>% 
  ggplot(aes(survey, stress)) +
  geom_jitter() +
  geom_smooth()
```


```{r}
redcap_ema_survey <-
  redcap_ema %>% 
  left_join(ssdm2_survey_data %>% mutate(ssdm2_subid = as.character(subid)), by = "ssdm2_subid") 
```

```{r}
redcap_ema_survey %>% count(ssdm2_subid)
```

```{r}
s_mod <- lmer(nervous ~ per_income * erq_reap + (1|ssdm2_subid) + (1|day:survey), data = redcap_ema_survey[redcap_ema_survey$per_income != 14,])
summary(s_mod)

effect("per_income * erq_reap", s_mod) %>% as_data_frame() %>% 
  ggplot(aes(per_income, fit, group = erq_reap, color = erq_reap)) +
  geom_line()

s_mod <- glmer(stress_exp ~ ladd_comm + (1|ssdm2_subid) + (1|day:survey), data = redcap_ema_survey, family = "binomial")
summary(s_mod)

mod <- summary(s_mod)
lc_re <- data.frame(coef = coef(s_mod)$ssdm2_subid[,1])
lc_re$subid <- as.integer(rownames(coef(s_mod)$ssdm2_subid))

lc_re <-
  lc_re %>% 
  left_join(
    ssdm2_survey_data %>% select(subid, ladd_comm), by = "subid"
  )

summary(lm(coef ~ ladd_comm, data = lc_re))
```

```{r}
cal_stress <-
  asa_24_total %>% 
  group_by(redcap_record_id, RecallNo) %>% 
  summarise(
    mean_sug = mean(ADD_SUGARS, na.rm = TRUE)
  ) %>% 
  mutate(day = RecallNo) %>% 
  left_join(
    redcap_ema %>% 
      group_by(redcap_record_id, day) %>% 
      summarise(
        mean_stress = mean(stress, na.rm = TRUE),
        mean_worried = mean(worried, na.rm = TRUE)
      ) %>% 
      mutate(
        day = as.integer(str_extract(day, "\\d"))
      ),
    by = c("redcap_record_id","day")
  )

summary(lmer(mean_sug ~ mean_worried + (1|redcap_record_id), data = cal_stress))
```
